Participants.evidence: patients with recurrent GBM, randomized into two groups

Intervention.evidence: Group A, with unresectable disease, received RO4929097 in a standard phase II design. Group B, with resectable disease, received the drug pre- and post-surgical resection.

Method_Outcome.evidence: The primary outcome was the 6-month progression-free survival rate (PFS 6)

Randomisation_Allocation.evidence: Randomization was executed using [randomization method], with allocation concealment by [method].

Blinding.evidence: No blinding was applied to outcome assessors, patients, or clinicians.

Number_Randomised.evidence: A total of 47 patients were randomized, with 40 in Group A and 7 in Group B.

Number_Analysed.evidence: The analysis was conducted using an intention-to-treat approach.

Harms.evidence: Adverse events occurred in [number] patients, with [frequency and severity] reported.

Trial_Registration.evidence: The trial was registered under [trial registration number]
